query.sql: SELECT t.student_id, t.student_code, t.student_name, t.email, t.enable_flag, t.class_id, t.telphone_num, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM fnd_student t #WHERE_CLAUSE# order by t.student_code

sqls.executeSql: INSERT INTO fnd_student (student_code, student_name, class_id, email, telphone_num, enable_flag, create_by, last_update_by, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (${@student_code}, ${@student_name}, ${@class_id}, ${@email}, ${@telphone_num}, ${@enable_flag}, ${@user_id}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), NOW())

whenSql.when: not exists (select 1 from sys_user where user_code= ${@student_code})
whenSql.querySql: SELECT r.role_id FROM sys_role r where role_code = 'STUDENT'
whenSql.executeSql: INSERT INTO sys_user (user_code, user_name, password, role_id, status, create_by, create_date, last_update_by, last_update_date) VALUES (${@student_code}, ${@student_name}, '123456', ${@role_id}, ${@enable_flag}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), ${@user_id}, NOW())

sqls.executeSql: update fnd_student set student_name = ${@student_name} , class_id = ${@class_id} , email = ${@email} , telphone_num = ${@telphone_num} , enable_flag = ${@enable_flag}, last_update_by =${@user_id} , last_update_date = NOW() where student_id = ${@student_id}
